## newRaceCancel() function

Create a race cancellation function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function newRaceCancel(isCancelled: IsCancelled, executor: CancelExecutor, cancelReason?: (() => CancelReason | undefined) | CancelReason): RaceCancel;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isCancelled | [IsCancelled](./race-cancellation.iscancelled.md) | a function that returns whether or not we are currently cancelled |
|  executor | [CancelExecutor](./race-cancellation.cancelexecutor.md) | a callback to resolve the cancellation |
|  cancelReason | (() =&gt; [CancelReason](./race-cancellation.cancelreason.md) \| undefined) \| [CancelReason](./race-cancellation.cancelreason.md) | an optional reason for the cancellation |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md)
